some.package.SomeClassTest 
at org.junitee.runner.TestRunner$1.run(TestRunner.java) 
at org.junitee.runner.TestRunner.run(TestRunner.java) 
at org.junitee.servlet.JUnitEEServlet.runTests(JUnitEEServlet.java)

But there are tests in my class, I can run it just fine using Swing 
UI.

Any idea?

Kind regards,
